main event: A sighting of a silver, disc-shaped object approximately 25-30 ft in diameter was reported on 12 September 1956 in Mc Comb, Mississippi.
interesting points: The object was observed while conducting a routine aircraft inspection,The sighting lasted about 3-4 minutes before the object disappeared to the south,The object was about 75-100 yards away from the observer,The weather conditions were clear with excellent visibility at the time of the sighting,No radar track was recorded for the object.
